constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 42 (Wednesday, March 9, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. SCHRADER:
H.R. 7047.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section I; and Article I, Section 8, Clause 18
of the United States Constitution.
[Page H1425]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

title: Lowering Costs by Improving Biosimilar Uptake Act
